title: marAvAdaruL tiru
sahitya:
maravAdaruL tirunAmattai mahAdEva naTarAja shuddha Om


anupallavi

  uravAga unran uNarvonru pOdum Odu nUlgaLellAm ozhindAlumE


caraNam    kaTra kalviyellAm maTTukkuL aDangum kalai peridu kAlamO siridu
ciTrarivan yAn peTra payanellAm shiva jnAnamonrE avani vAzhvilE
